presentation.title: Prakthiza kwinhlolokhono yakho elandelayo yomsebenzi!
presentation.message:
Ingabe ukuthatha izingxoxo zemisebenzi kukuthola uvalo futhi ukhathazeke?
Mhlawumbe usazizwa ungakulungele ukuthatha izingxoxo zomsebenzi?
Lolu uhlelo lokusebenza oluhle kakhulu lokuzijwayeza amakhono akho okuxoxa esimweni sengxoxo somsebenzi!

presentation.title: Zilungiselele umsebenzi wakho olandelayo!
presentation.message: I-Job IntelliVieiewer isebenzisa amandla wobuhlakani bokufakelwa ukwenza izingxoxo zemisebenzi ehlekisayo ukuze ikusize uhlanganise amakhono okuxoxa adingekayo ekuqasheni impilo yangempela futhi kukwenze ulungele i-ace interview yakho yangempela yempilo yangempela.

presentation.title: Ukubhaliswa kwe-Premium:
presentation.message: Thola umbiko ekugcineni kwengxoxo ngayinye efingqa ingxoxo ngempendulo nezeluleko zokuthi ungawathuthukisa kanjani amathuba akho okuqashwa kwinhlolokhono yangempela yomsebenzi.

list.title: Susa umlando?
list.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa wonke umlando?

entry.title: Susa Ingxoxo?
entry.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le ngxoxo?

validation.title: Iphutha Lokuqinisekiswa
validation.invalid_fields:
Faka indawo evumelekile yomsebenzi ukufaka isicelo senhlolokhono entsha yomsebenzi.
Ngenye indlela

color_scheme.name: Isihloko
color_scheme.description:
Khetha phakathi kwengqikithi elula nemnyama.
Setha ngokuzenzakalelayo itimu yedivayisi okokuqala lapho uvula uhlelo lokusebenza.

language.name: Ulimi
language.description: Khetha ulimi olukhethwe ukulubonisa ngenkathi usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza futhi ukhuluma ne-AI ngesikhathi sezingxoxo.

cooldown.description:
Uhlobo lwamahhala lwe-App likuvumela ukuthi uthathe ingxoxo eyodwa ngehora.

Uma ungathanda ukususa umkhawulo, susa izikhangiso, bese uthola umbiko wempendulo ngeseluleko sendlela yokuthuthukisa ngemuva kwengxoxo ngayinye, cabanga ngokubhalisela i-Premium.
cooldown.active:
Lindela isibali sesikhathi esidala ngaphambi kokukhipha inhlolokhono entsha.

Uma ungathanda ukususa ama-cooldown, susa izikhangiso, bese uthola umbiko wempendulo ngezeluleko zeseluleko sendlela yokuthuthukisa ngemuva kwengxoxo ngayinye, cabanga ngokubhalisela i-Premium.

review.request:
Uma uluthandile uhlelo lokusebenza, sicela ucabangele ukushiya isibuyekezo ukusisiza.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Ingxoxo entsha iyatholakala!
new_interview.message: Unengxoxo entsha etholakalayo ongayithatha kwi-Job Intelliviewler.

subscription.title: Umvuzo
subscription.thanks: Ngiyabonga ngokubhalisela i-premium! Sifisela wena inhlanhla nempumelelo kuzo zonke izingxoxo zakho zesikhathi esizayo!

error.subscription_options:
Ayikwazi ukulayisha amasu wokubhalisa.

Sicela ubheke ukuxhumana kwakho kwe-inthanethi, noma uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.

error.title: Ukuphambeka
error.connection_fix: Bheka ukuxhumana kwakho kwe-inthanethi bese uzama futhi emuva kwesikhathi.

store.short_description: Prakthiza ukuxoxisana ngomsebenzi wakho olandelayo nalesi simulator esingokoqobo se-AI
store.full_description:
Ingabe ukuthatha izingxoxo zemisebenzi kukuthola uvalo futhi ukhathazeke?
Mhlawumbe usazizwa ungakulungele ukuthatha izingxoxo zomsebenzi?
Lolu uhlelo lokusebenza oluhle kakhulu lokuzijwayeza amakhono akho okuxoxa esimweni sengxoxo somsebenzi!

I-Job IntelliVieiewer isebenzisa amandla wobuhlakani bokufakelwa ongokoqobo izingxoxo zomsebenzi ezihlekisayo ukukusiza ukuhlanganisa amakhono okuxoxa okudingekayo ukwenza umbono omuhle wabaqashi bempilo yangempela futhi ukwenze ulungele i-ace interview yakho elandelayo.

Izingxoxo zenzelwe isikhundla somsebenzi osifunayo, futhi zizokwakhiwa futhi zilungiswe ngemibuzo ehlobene nezinhloso zakho ukuze zifaneke kangcono ingxoxo yangempela yomsebenzi.

Abasebenzisi bePrimiyamu bazothola nombiko ekugcineni kwengxoxo ngayinye efingqa ingxoxo nempendulo nezeluleko zendlela yokuthuthukisa amathuba akho okuqashwa kwinhlolokhono yangempela yomsebenzi.
taglines: Ace umbuzo wakho olandelayo womsebenzi ne-AI!
Impumelelo yakho elandelayo yobungcweti ikulindele lapha!

premium_benefits: Thola imibiko ngempendulo nezeluleko ngemuva kwezingxoxo

translation.title: Siza ukuhumusha
translation.description: Siza Humumisa lolu hlelo kwezinye izilimi.
